data.title: Digital Fortress: A Thriller
data.meta_description: Find out how long it will take you to read 'Digital Fortress: A Thriller' by using our book word count search. Search for a book, tell us how fast you read, and start reading!
data.text:
The average reader will spend 6 hours and 24 minutes reading this book at 250 WPM (words per minute).

How long will it take you?

Your speed

To find your reading speed you can take one of our WPM tests.

Before the multi-million, runaway bestseller The Da Vinci Code, Dan Brown set his razor-sharp research and storytelling skills on the most powerful intelligence organization on earth--the National Security Agency (NSA)--in this thrilling novel, Digital Fortress.

When the NSA's invincible code-breaking machine encounters a mysterious code it cannot break, the agency calls its head cryptographer, Susan Fletcher, a brilliant, beautiful mathematician. What she uncovers sends shock waves through the corridors of power. The NSA is being held hostage--not by guns or bombs -- but by a code so complex that if released would cripple U.S. intelligence. Caught in an accelerating tempest of secrecy and lies, Fletcher battles to save the agency she believes in. Betrayed on all sides, she finds herself fighting not only for her country but for her life, and in the end, for the life of the man she loves.
